TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlDataSourceEnumerator extends System.Data.Common.DbDataSourceEnumerator
Public NotInheritable Class SqlDataSourceEnumerator Inherits DbDataSourceEnumerator

summary.span: 提供了一种枚举本地网络内的所有可用 SQL Server 实例的机制。

span.span: Provides a mechanism for enumerating all available instances of SQL Server within the local network.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SQL Server 2000 和 SQL Server 2005 使其适用于应用程序以确定当前的网络中的 SQL Server 实例存在。Both SQL Server 2000 and SQL Server 2005 make it possible for applications to determine the existence of SQL Server instances within the current network. 类公开给应用程序开发人员，提供此信息包含有关所有可用服务器的信息。The class exposes this information to the application developer, providing a containing information about all the available servers. 此返回的表包含列表的与的列表匹配提供当用户尝试创建新的连接，服务器实例和`Connection Properties`对话框中，展开包含所有可用服务器的下拉列表。This returned table contains a list of server instances that matches the list provided when a user attempts to create a new connection, and on the `Connection Properties` dialog box, expands the drop-down list containing all the available servers.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.DataTable GetDataSources() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDataSources () As DataTable

summary.span: 检索包含有关所有可见 SQL Server 2000 或 SQL Server 2005 实例的信息的 。

span.span: Retrieves a containing information about all visible SQL Server 2000 or SQL Server 2005 instances.

returns.span: 返回一个包含有关可见 SQL Server 实例的信息的 。

span.span: Returns a containing information about the visible SQL Server instances.
